doc.field: middle aged, dark straight hair, combed back, dark mustache and short beard, seated in profile view in a silk smoking jacket or dressing gown, books on lap or low table, holding a globe with pencil on one hand [Jaeger, Charles H., Ulmann's husband, Physician, and Assistant Professor of Orthopaedics, Columbia]
